title: YouTube will label AI-generated videos that look real
description: The Google-owned video platform says it will shut accounts if they don't disclose when they use AI tools to make realistic-looking content. Other platforms are adopting similar policies.

title: House stalls impeachment of Homeland Secretary Mayorkas for handling of immigration
description: Hard-right Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene forced a vote on impeaching Mayorkas to the floor, but eight Republicans joined with Democrats to vote 209-201 to send Greene's resolution to committees.
